column5: Planning a late Sept. trip to Caribou Lake near Armstrong. Any thoughts or comments on this lake? Just wondering what to expect as far as lake trout and walleye.
Some comments from guys that have fished there. http://www.lake-link.com/boards/foru...hreadTypeID=43

Be careful on this lake, especially in late Sep. I have never been on the lake but my secretary and her husband fish and hunt moose on this body of water. I don't know which resort you are staying at but I am sure they will help you out with conditions. This lake can get very nasty if the wind is blowing from certain directions.
